title: Once-Popular Shopping District in Osaka is Seeing Wave of Store Closures
description: Umeda’s Chayamachi district, located on the east side of central Osaka, is undergoing a noticeable shift as major retailers including Loft and ZARA have closed or relocated this year, even as large-scale developments such as Grand Green Osaka continue to open…
content:
OSAKA, Dec 05 (News On Japan) -
